name: Los Statos de Luxe - Delirios
additionalNotes: Los Statos de Lux was established around 1940 and was deleted from Habanos portfolio around 2005.In about 1980, the handmade cigars were replaced with machine-made versions. The sleepy Los Statos Deluxe brand from Scandinavian Tobacco Group has new life with an updated blend and more streamlined, modern packaging. The project is a collaboration between brand manager Justin Andrews and Matt Booth, who recently joined STG as creative director. The new blend is made up of an Ecuadoran Sumatra wrapper, Nicaraguan binder and a fillers from Nicaragua and the Dominican Republic.
